ygData.subject: Re: Interesting Concept...
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the first instance that I ve seen, and in line with my no tolerance spam policy, the person has been banned from the list.  But, instead of jumping the
ygData.messageBody:
This is the first instance that I've seen, and in line with my no tolerance
spam policy, the person has been banned from the list. But, instead of
jumping the gun next time, try to find a polite method of informing the list
moderator or, if you don't like it, you can remove yourself from the mailing
list.

Rob
List Moderator


----- Original Message -----
From: Jeremy Spielmann <spielman@...>
To: <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, February 19, 2000 11:37 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_SMITHS] Interesting Concept...


> From: "Jeremy Spielmann" <spielman@...>
